divs: sighting detailsi was next seated to my friend in the car he was driving, we have been working and he brought me back home. as usual i do look at clear night sky and first i saw a intense red light in the sky, my friend saw it too, he stopped the car and we watched out of the front window of the car and we saw a cigar shape - distance from ground to object unknown - it wasn't a plane or a helicopter, they usually have to blink here in switzerland and it wasn't a known noise to hear when i open the window of the car, it was like a hovering hum. it was a straight flight of the object, it seems for a second it would like to stop but it flew on - the backligt was in a intense blue\white. i never saw an object like this before in our night sky. first i thought it's a star, then a airplane and then a helicopter - but it was none of them. since i feel that there is "more" outside our planet i regulary watch the night sky - so i still hope that we gonna meet other life forms. the object just get out of our sight then - during of this event; aprox. 3min
Summary: Cigar shaped object with intense front- and backlight
trends: There have been no other sightings in Brienz
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
